name: 2D Platform Tutorial (sherrye)
description:
This is my 2D Platformer Tutorial Project

Things I plan to add:

  1. Boss enemy level, new enemy that takes longer to kill, and more obstacles such as acid and no powerups that level
  2. Adding additional levels, instead of 3+ boss level, there are going to be 5 not including the boss
  3. Player will have different interface
